text: Mindanao is one of the three main island groups in the Philippines. It is the southernmost major island of the Philippines, and is the only island in the Philippines are predominantly Muslim people. Mindanao is northeast of Sabah. It may also refer to the main island in the group. ==List of provinces of Mindanao state== Province Capital Region Agusan del Norte Cabadbaran City Caraga Agusan del Sur Prosperidad Basilan Isabela
